00001 /*  
00002  * File: mthCompFlowEqnModel.h 
00003  * --------------------------- 
00004  * Header file for Compositional Flow Equation Model
00005  * 
00006  * Calculate accumulation terms
00007  * Flux terms are calculated in mthCompFlowEqnConn2PImp(2P) or mthCompFlowEqnConnMPImp(MP)
00008  * ------------------------------------------  
00009  * Created      01/31/99        Huic  
00010  * Modified by HPan in Feb. 2006 for separation of connection implementation
00011  * 
00012  */ 
00013 
00014 #ifndef MTHCOMPFLOWEQNMODEL_H_ 
00015 #define MTHCOMPFLOWEQNMODEL_H_ 
00016 
00017 #include "mthFlowEqnModel.h"
00018  
00019 class mthCompFlowEqnModel : public mthFlowEqnModel { 
00020 public: 
00021         mthCompFlowEqnModel(DataPool *dataPool); 
00022         virtual ~mthCompFlowEqnModel();
00023 
00024         virtual void registerData();            // register data from datapool
00025         virtual void linearize(double dt);      // calculate Jacobian and RHS
00026         virtual bool newtonUpdate();    // Newton update
00027 
00028         //define the friend class
00029         friend class mthCompFlowEqnConn2PImp;
00030         friend class mthCompFlowEqnConnMPImp;
00031         friend class mthCompFlowEqnDiff2PImp;
00032         friend class mthCompFlowEqnDiffMPImp; 
00033 
00034 protected:
00035         // --- calculate phase potential difference and upstream direction ---
00036         virtual void calcPhasePotDifAndUpStrDir();
00037         virtual void calcConnDifAndUpStrDir();
00038 
00039 private:
00040         // --- read only data ---
00041         const double *mDDens_Dxi, *mDMob_Dxi;   // density and mobility derivative to mole frac 
00042         const double *mComp_MW, *mPhase_MW;     // component and phase molecular weight 
00043 
00044         // --- private methods ---
00045         // --- calculate accumulation term and its derivatives ---
00046         void linearizeAcc(double dt);
00047         void calcDAccDp(int ib, double dt);
00048         void calcDAccDs(int ib, double dt);
00049         void calcDAccDxi(int ib, double dt);
00050         void calcAccRHS(int ib, double dt);
00051 
00052         // --- calculate flux term and its derivatives ---
00053         void linearizeFlux();
00054         void linearizeDiff();
00055         void linearizeDisp();
00056 
00057 };
00058 
00059 #endif
